title: #76/Frances Anderton of DnA
description:
Not only did Tom resupply the Cheetos and those delicious Delta airlines cookies today but we have the privilege of talking with podcast host Frances Anderton. 

If you live in LA, you’re heard her since 2002 every Tuesday on KCRW and the podcast DNA which stands for Design N Architecture.  She is also a full-time producer of KCRW's national and local current affairs shows To The Point and Which Way, LA?  We’ve been fans for years, and her insightful stories and interviews inspire design fans nationwide!
